sub_title: Director Globalshore Solutions | Delivery Management | Program management | Management SW group | Competency & Customer Value management | Outsourcing |  MBA
summary:
“I am passionate about competence and customer value management, I believe, it is the essence for sustainable business and profits.”

Professionally spanned over 25+ years career demonstrating comprehensive experience in product SW development, projects, programs and delivery management across multiple sectors. I have a strong technical, multidisciplinary and complex high-tech industries background mainly in the domains of consumer electronics, semiconductors and automotive. This background is well complemented with business management aspects of managing program deliveries, groups, competencies, integrated project management, outsourcing, technical marketing and sales support. Skilled with managing customers, partners, suppliers and facilitating teams. I am motivated to build strong competencies and to successfully complete deliveries to the satisfaction of customers with growth and profitability for own organization.

Overall a highly customer centered career involving both local and international customers/ partners including companies from Belgium, Bulgaria, China, France, Germany, India, the Netherlands, Philippines, Singapore, Taiwan and United States of America. A career that enables me to speak and understand the used language at various organizational levels both internally and externally at customers.

Core competencies: 
• Customer value management
• Delivery management
• Program management
• Product development
• Competence management
• Project management
• Agile methodologies
• Software Outsourcing management
• Business development & sales and sales Support
• SW architecture
• Requirement engineering
• Standard compliance
• Quality and Process improvement
• Liaison with suppliers and partners
• Technical marketing documentation

authors.headline: Director Globalshore Solutions | Delivery Management | Program management | Management SW group | Competency & Customer Value management | Outsourcing |  MBA

profile_positions.description:
Capgemini Engineering is world leader in Engineering and R&D services, we unleash R&D potential and innovation to help clients create smart products, optimized operations, new customer experiences and new sources of value.
In the 2022 Sogeti's DMF division and Altran NL were merged and Capgemini Engineering is formed.
Since September 2022,  I'm responsible to offer solutions to customers and grow business with profitable revenue using Capgemini's global competencies.
profile_positions.title: Director Globalshore Solutions

profile_positions.description:
Sogeti is a leading provider of technology and engineering services. Sogeti delivers solutions that enable digital transformation and offers cutting-edge expertise in Cloud, Cyber security, Digital Manufacturing, Quality Assurance & Testing, and emerging technologies. 
At Sogeti, as a Senior Client Engagement manager my key responsibilities and successes are:
-Manage overall SW Development (SDEV) program delivery portfolio with 20+ projects for ASML (Team Size: 1DM, 10 PM and 130+FTE located in NL and in France).
-Manage and monitor scope, KPIs, plans, risks, quality, budget and customer satisfaction successfully with the project teams.
-Define SDEV program delivery growth plan for key account of ASML
-Align with clients on defining scope and securing budget for projects. 
-Manage resourcing and competence foot print for program delivery group.
-Manage and report to Sogeti and ASML on program status.
-Bilateral alignments with stakeholders at across several levels.
-Working with sales, bid management, career managers, resourcing, finance and other delivery groups for program operations and growth.
-Evaluate and facilitate program group members on personals and professional needs and growth.
-Member of management group and responsible for recruitment strategy in the High tech sector.
-Mentor/ coach to junior project managers.

Success:
-For last 2 year achieved the targets. Account is tripled in size from 2 digit to ~3 digits FTEs and revenues accordingly. 
-Led program wide initiatives to obtain higher grades in ASML's supplier QLTCS assessment and target achieved successfully for last 2 years.
-Increased competence footprint of Sogeti at ASML.
-Successfully setup delivery operational model with features like ASML specific training program, feedback loop and delivery resource pool to meet group wide demands and forecasts.
-Honored with Sogeti Delivery Hero 2021 award.
-Nominee for Capgemini Diamond 2021 award.
profile_positions.title: Sen Client Engagement Manager | Program Delivery Manager | Contract Manager | Manager CoE

profile_positions.description:
At Sogeti, as a Program Delivery manager and Manager CoE my key responsibilities were:
-Head development and operations of 'Center of Excellence' ( CoE ) at offshore sites in India.
-Manage and deliver multiple Rightshore @ (onshore/ offshore) customer projects for TomTom (NL), Airbus (UK), and Cymer (USA) accounts. Overall program size: in @10 projects with a team of 7 PMs, 20 FTE in NL, 4 FTE in USA, 1 FTE in China and ~80 FTE in India at multiple locations. 
-Define program delivery growth plan for key accounts of ASML (SD), TomTom and CoE in India.
-Manage and monitor stakeholder's, project plans, risks, quality, budgets and customer satisfaction.
-Aligning with customer on defining scope and securing budget for projects. 
-Facilitate teams, resource projects and manage program delivery group competencies.
-Manage and report to internal stakeholders and customers on program status. 
-Bilateral alignments with stakeholders at several levels. 
-Work with HR, unit management and sales on pre-sales and identify new opportunities at customer.
-Define offshore rate card. 
-Airbus is a proud success story where delivery was transformed bringing in value to both customer and Sogeti. Renegotiated financial contract values and successfully met the targets.
profile_positions.title: Program Delivery Manager  | Manager CoE

profile_positions.description:
At Sogeti, as a Senior Project manager High tech my key responsibilities are:
- Delivery manager for TomTom, Airbus and Cymer accounts.
- Setting up CoE (Center of Excellence in India).
-Manage and monitor stakeholder's, project plans, risks, quality, budgets and customer satisfaction.
-Aligning with customer on defining scope and securing budget for projects. 
-Facilitate teams and resource projects.
-Manage and report to internal stakeholders and customers on delivery status. 
-Work with HR, unit management and sales on pre-sales and identify new opportunities at customer.
- In the Netherlands I am part of core group leading recruitment strategy.
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager High Tech

profile_positions.description: Enabling customers of TMC in managing their product development.
profile_positions.title: Software Outsourcing Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Strypes provides project based software solutions to customer problems in embedded domain. It has nearshore development center in Bulgaria.
The Build Redesign, a POC project within SEI division at ASML is co-developed with team from Strypes in Bulgaria. Overall team size is 9 FTE with 5 FTE in Strypes, Bulgaria and 3 FTE at ASML in Eindhoven.
As a project lead for front office and scrum master for the overall project, I facilitated both local and remote teams and monitor scope, plan, progress, scope, time, budget and risks. At ASML side, I ensured that continuous stream of work backlog is available, that is in scope and matching priorities of the project. On the Strypes side, ensured that backlog items are understood and delivered as per  requirement and quality, basically as a bridge align work packages with the remote team.
profile_positions.title: Project Lead

profile_positions.description: At Altran (Formerly Nspyre), involved in both internal and external SW development projects. Pankaj is a Project manager and Scrum master for IOT and Big data analytics platform solutions from Altran. He is managing project proposals for IOT/ big data solutions to the customers. As a scrum master he	streamlined agile process framework and supports 2 values streams teams.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager/ Scrum Master

profile_positions.description:
The Intelligent Transport System (ITS) project is a continuation of Nspyre's efforts to build competencies in the area of cooperative driving and smart mobility. Results of this project would be demonstrated at international ITS event in Bordeaux.
Pankaj is managing this project as a project leader and product owner including defining PMP, product backlog, integration target per sprint, reporting to stake holders, monitoring effort and quality. He is also an interface to partner companies.
profile_positions.title: Project Lead/ Product Owner

profile_positions.description: The 'Intelligent traffic infra and car navigation' is a project for building competencies, Pankaj is responsible for managing this in-house project, create use cases & requirements, grooming resources and coordinates with stakeholders.
profile_positions.title: Project Lead

profile_positions.description:
At Nspyre B.V. several ASML outsourced projects are in execution, with both success and failure stories. This management project was conceived to study, identify and propose solutions to the failure situations.
Pankaj analyzed Nspyre’s external and internal environment to investigate the desired and provided customer values to ASML. Gaps were identified and recommendations were made to win and sustain customer.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description: For different car manufacturers projects Pankaj was mainly responsible for SW development activities such as requirement gathering, design & development, coaching and leading SW porting activities. For one of the projects he successfully setup the execution architecture, leading to system performance improvements. He also presented several in house and B2B customer demos.
profile_positions.title: Senior Software Engineer / Team Lead

profile_positions.description: At Philips consumer Life Style as a system architect my role was to specify amendments to CI+ standard and high level architecture & functional requirements based on CI+ specification for digital TVs. For this specification I was responsible for planning and communication to the stakeholder teams in Eindhoven, Bruges and external parties (module makers).
profile_positions.title: System Architect
